Night Shift rolls ahead of Scorponok at a steady speed, and keeps his vehic=
le mode just in case he may have to make a run for it. He knew that keeping=
 up with four tires on two legs was next to near impossible, unless of cour=
se the robot chasing you had the same capabilities. Accidentally his tires =
kick up some dust as they spin.

"Whoops, sorry about that.  Caught a slipp=
ery spot. Hmm, time ta change the tires I think."

He moves forward.

--- I=
